    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_93619</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Where photosynthesis occurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wo Fotosynthese auftritt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Là où la photosynthèse se produit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Onde a fotossíntese ocorre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dove la fotosintesi accade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όπου η φωτοσύνθεση εμφανίζεται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Donde ocurre la fotosíntesis</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that photosynthesis occurs at the chloroplasts where bacteria gather due to the presence of oxygen.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bacteria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cell wall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chlorophyll</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chloroplasts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Nucleus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">photosynthesis</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Fotosynthese an den 
Chloroplasten auftritt, in denen Bakterium wegen des Vorhandenseins 
des Sauerstoffes erfaßt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la photosynthèse 
se produit aux chloroplastes où les bactéries recueillent en raison 
de la présence de l'oxygène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a fotossíntese 
ocorre nos chloroplasts onde as bactérias recolhem  devido à 
presença do oxigênio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la fotosintesi si
presenta ai cloroplasti in cui i batteri riuniscono dovuto la 
presenza di ossigeno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η φωτοσύνθεση 
εμφανίζεται στους χλωροπλάστες όπου τα βακτηρίδια συλλέγουν λόγω
στην παρουσία οξυγόνου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la fotosíntesis 
ocurre en los cloroplastos donde las bacterias recolectan debido a la 
presencia del oxígeno.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
